question: Which of the following is not the founder of the Rahnumai Mazadayasan Sabha?
explanation: The Western-educated progressive Parsis like Dadabhai Naoroji, J.B. Wacha, S.S. Bangali, and Naoroji Furdonji founded the Rahanumai Mazdayasanan Sabha which was a Religious Reform Association in 1851.Â Shibli Nomani is not one of the founders of the Rahnumai Mazadayasan Sabha.
